mapper.select: select * from followuprecord where FOLLOWUPRECORD_ID = #{id} AND STATUS = #{status}

select fur.FOLLOWUPRECORD_ID, fur.PRODUCTS_ID, fur.PRODUCT_NM, fur.SUPPLIER_ID, fur.SUPPLIER, fur.CUSTOMER_ID, fur.SAL_CUSTOMER, fur.SAL_DATE, fur.SAL_EVENT, fur.SAL_CONTENT, fur.PROC_DATE, fur.PROC_ANSWER from followuprecord as fur inner join projects as pro on fur.PRODUCTS_ID = pro.PRODUCTS_ID and fur.SUPPLIER_ID = pro.SUPPLIER_ID where fur.PRODUCTS_ID =#{products_id} AND fur.SUPPLIER_ID =#{supplier_id} AND fur.STATUS = #{status} order by fur.SAL_DATE
